channel.title: Investigations: Court Record {Evidence- Part 0}
channel.description:
All Evidence will go here.
It will be in the format
> ## Report on Dead Game Online > **Overview:** Dead Game hosted by Shurian. **Details:** Link to any RP Shurian hosted.

item.title: Investigations: Court Record {Evidence- Part 0}
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
This is the public one. They have their own.
After all, they share different pools of evidence (based on their investigation) so there is a need to have a public one where only when evidence if presented, will it be available for everyone to use.

Imagine having extra evidence that neither side has dug out. The case will be unsolvable.

Also, stop talking on my thread. Angery Shu Shu noises.

Read full topic

item.title: Investigations: Court Record {Evidence- Part 0}

item.description:
these should just be DMs for the people in the game rather than like 3 separate threads

Read full topic
